title: Full Stack Engineer
description: Collaborated within an Agile Scrum team to develop a CRM  solution tailored for real estate agents, specializing in the new constructions sector.
Involved in the full-scale migration of the product, encompassing both Frontend and Backend components, to state-of-the-art technologies, optimizing performance and user experience.
Joined the Security Chapter of the company.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description: Executed the successful implementation of multiple features across diverse applications for Portugal's leading payment sector entity.
Played a pivotal role in orchestrating themigration of the antiquated authorization service to Keycloak, ensuring enhanced security.
Involved in the migration of legacy products to cutting-edge technologies.

title: Software Engineer
description: Led end-to-end processes, including design, estimation, implementation, testing, and ongoing maintenance, for novel features in a CRM application.
Ensured robust code quality and functionality through the meticulous development and execution of unit and integration tests.
Conducted functional and technical presentations to showcase the developed features, ensuring a complete understanding across teams and stakeholders.

title: Software Engineer
description: Independently designed and implemented an orchestrator to automate software installation processes from internal team, eliminating the need for manual validation and task execution.

Executed the complete implementation and documentation of the database architecture and entire codebase, ensuring a robust and well-documented foundation for efficient system operation and maintenance.

title: Software Engineer
description: Played a key role in implementing multiple software enhancements  within a Customer Care & Billing application for the billing sector.
Effectively addressed and resolved various client-reported issues in adherence to SLA contracts
